Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29404 affecting package msft-golang for versions less than 1.19.10-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-29404 affecting package msft-golang for versions less than 1.19.10-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package msft-golang is earlier than 1.19.10-1, affected by CVE-2023-29404
